sources.name: Employees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

sinks.name: sinkNewDims
sinks.script:
Select2 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		EmpID = Select2@EmpID,
		RegionCode = Select2@RegionCode,
		StatusCode = Select2@StatusCode,
		FunctionCode = Select2@FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel = Select2@GradeLevel,
		RoleCode = Select2@RoleCode,
		StartDt = Select2@StartDt,
		EndDt = Select2@EndDt,
		iscurrent
	)) ~> sinkNewDims

sinks.name: ageOutOld
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent
	)) ~> ageOutOld

sinks.name: sinkForUpdates
sinks.script:
SetAttrsForUpdates sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		EmpID = ConditionalSplit1@EmpID,
		RegionCode = ConditionalSplit1@RegionCode,
		StatusCode = ConditionalSplit1@StatusCode,
		FunctionCode = ConditionalSplit1@FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel = ConditionalSplit1@GradeLevel,
		RoleCode = ConditionalSplit1@RoleCode,
		StartDt = ConditionalSplit1@StartDt,
		EndDt = ConditionalSplit1@EndDt,
		iscurrent
	)) ~> sinkForUpdates

transformations.name: LookupIDs
transformations.script:
TypeConversions1, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversions1@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
LookupIDs split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates, TypeConversions exists(ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates@RegionCode == DimEmployees@RegionCode,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
SetAttrsOld select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = ConditionalSplit1@EmpID,
		EndDt = ConditionalSplit1@EndDt,
		iscurrent
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: Select2
transformations.script:
SetAttrsForNew select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = ConditionalSplit1@EmpID,
		RegionCode = ConditionalSplit1@RegionCode,
		StatusCode = ConditionalSplit1@StatusCode,
		FunctionCode = ConditionalSplit1@FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel = ConditionalSplit1@GradeLevel,
		RoleCode = ConditionalSplit1@RoleCode,
		StartDt = ConditionalSplit1@StartDt,
		EndDt = ConditionalSplit1@EndDt,
		iscurrent
	))~> Select2
